item.title: Few Problems W/ Devolution V7
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Hi, i just started a new dodian server and I need help on a few things.

  1. When I add starter command: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 100000); sendMessage("Here is your starter package, courtesy of Crypt :D"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (Starter == 1) { sendMessage("Sorry, 1 starter per player."); }
    I get like 100 errors, saying I need to add ; to a bunch of things, and when I take it out, it works fine.

1 more thing: How do I add a message to all saying u killed something like "Ice Queen has been killed by PlayerName(Level ??)

Please post right away.

ALSO I NEED A TUTORIAL ON HOW TO ADD ::giveowner, ::givemod, ::giveadmin

Read full topic
